mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT o.call_number AS callNumber, b.title, b.image_url AS imageUrl FROM own_book o LEFT JOIN book b ON o.isbn = b.isbn order by b.publication_year desc ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 10

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT o.call_number AS callNumber, b.title, b.image_url AS imageUrl, count(l.call_number) AS cnt FROM loan l LEFT JOIN own_book o ON l.call_number = o.call_number LEFT JOIN book b ON o.isbn = b.isbn group by o.call_number, b.title, b.image_url order by cnt desc ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 10
